name: Granola with Berries
instructions:
Preheat the oven to 175c. Mix all the dry ingredients. Drizzle on the honey, tahini and maple syrup. Mix well and place on a baking tray, greased with coconut oil cook in the oven 15-20min, mixing every now and again so it won't burn. Then add the dried berries and cook for 3min more.
Let it cool for a bit and enjoy.
instructions-extended: Tip: This cereal tastes nice with cashew milk.
